Title: The Great Gatsby
Author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
Summary: A novel about the American dream and the tragic story of Jay Gatsby, a mysterious millionaire.

Title: To Kill a Mockingbird
Author: Harper Lee
Summary: A novel that deals with serious issues like racial injustice and moral growth in the Deep South.

Author: George Orwell
Summary: A dystopian novel that explores the dangers of totalitarianism and extreme political ideology.
